attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This important intiative from the 90s was abandoned before it's beneficial effects could be fully felt.

Not only do we urgently need such a Hotline (with associated website) but it would reinvigorate the Prime Minister's standing with the Nation.  What do we want?  A Cones Hotline with associated website!  When do we want it?  Now!
